description: Run, hike, scramble, jump in the river, then do it again. When mountains are your playground, the light, durable Incendo is your short. The comfortable, breathable, four-way stretch Fortius™ Air 50 nylon fabric is perfect for days in motion, and the fit is streamlined and patterned for freedom of movement. The elastic waist adjusts for a secure fit, and storage is secure – zippered hand pockets and a flapped one in the back.
name: Arcteryx Incendo Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens
